content.description:
Questions 28-33 are based on an excerpt that consists of an introduction and three sections, as diagrammed below. The introduction and section 1 will be played two times. Then, sections 2 and 3 will be played two times. Finally, the entire excerpt will be played once. Before listening to the introduction and section 1 for the first time, please read Questions 28-30.
 IntroductionSection 1Section 2Section 3Phrase 1          Phrase 2Phrase 1          Phrase 22 measures4 measures     4 measures8 measures4 measures     4 measures

Courtesy of Naxos of America, Inc.
content.question: The introduction features all of the following compositional devices EXCEPT

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
